title: Introduction to Network Routing
description: Foundational networking course covering routing concepts including routers, routing tables, path selection, and protocols.

title: Networking Foundations: Local Area Networks (LANs)
description: Core concepts of LAN technologies including switching, topologies, and network devices.

title: Programming for Everybody (Python)
description: Python fundamentals including variables, loops, functions, and basic programming logic.

title: Agile Software Development: Clean Coding Practices
description: Clean code principles focusing on readable, maintainable software following Agile best practices.

title: Agile Software Development: Refactoring
description: Refactoring techniques to improve code readability, quality, and maintainability.

title: Object-Oriented Programming with C#
description: Comprehensive introduction to C# OOP including classes, inheritance, and interfaces.

title: Programming Foundations: Databases
description: Database schema, relational modeling, querying, and SQL fundamentals.

title: SQL Essential Training
description: Core SQL operations including joins, filtering, subqueries, and relational database design.

title: Understanding the Impact of a Merger for IT Teams
description: How mergers affect IT teams including system integration, change management, and infrastructure planning.

title: Data Science Methodology
description: CRISP-DM framework, problem framing, data collection, modeling, and deployment.

title: Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python
description: SQL fundamentals, relational databases, and using Python for structured data analysis.

title: Data Structures
description: Arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, and algorithmic complexity.

title: Flutter Development Certificate
description: Flutter fundamentals including widgets, layouts, Dart basics, and mobile UI development.

title: Fraud Prevention in the Charity Sector
description: Identifying, preventing, and managing fraud risks in nonprofit organizations.

title: Jumpstart Your Skills with Large Language Models
description: Core concepts of LLMs, prompt engineering, and generative AI workflows.

title: Generative AI: Advanced Fine-Tuning for LLMs
description: Advanced fine-tuning techniques, optimization, and LLM deployment.

title: Introduction to Data Science Specialization
description: 4-course specialization covering SQL, tools, methodology, and DS foundations.

title: Microsoft Office Specialist: Excel 2019 Associate
description: Proficiency in Excel 2019 including functions, sheets, data analysis, and tables.

title: Microsoft Office Specialist: Office Productivity Suite
description: Certification covering Word, PowerPoint, Outlook, and Access.

title: Introduction to Java
description: Java syntax, OOP concepts, loops, and classes.

title: Fundamentals of AI Agents Using RAG & LangChain
description: RAG pipelines, LangChain, retrieval models, and agent orchestration.

title: Beginning Custom Projects with Raspberry Pi
description: GPIO control, Linux basics, sensors, and Pi-based embedded systems.

title: Study UK: Preparing for Work
description: Job readiness, CV writing, interviews, workplace skills.

title: Tools for Data Science
description: Git, Jupyter, RStudio, and IBM tools used in real-world DS workflows.

title: Introduction to SQL for Data Science
description: SQL basics focused on analytics, filtering, joins, and relational theory.

title: Start the UX Design Process: Empathize, Define, and Ideate
description: UX design fundamentals: empathy mapping, problem definition, and ideation.

title: What is Data Science?
description: High-level overview of the data science field, applications, and roles.
